title: About Me
content: I'm Alfredo Bonilla, a Senior Software Engineer with over 13 years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in Web3 and blockchain technologies.
My expertise includes TypeScript, React, Node.js, and various blockchain frameworks. I'm passionate about creating intuitive and efficient web applications, particularly in the Web3 space.

As a co-organizer of Ethereum Costa Rica and an ambassador for Thirdweb, I'm deeply involved in the blockchain community. I've founded several tech communities and am committed to education and mentoring in emerging technologies.
I've contributed to numerous Web3 projects, including Cofiblocks, Lago Finance, and Apy-Vision, where I've designed and built complex blockchain applications.

Beyond coding, I'm an active mentor, having taught over 1000 students about Web3 and blockchain. I've also participated in various hackathons and hacker houses, contributing to projects like Semaphore Paymaster and OpenTribe.

When I'm not immersed in the world of Web3, you can find me sharing knowledge through podcasts, speaking at tech events, or creating educational content about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.
